title: The Quirky Tale of April Hale
description: Self-proclaimed 'weirdo' April Hale and the notorious 'bad boy' Ryder Black have been living side by side for more than 10 years. Both never attempted to communicate with each other, but on the night Ryder Black is thrown out by his own father, he asks her a question that might change both of their lives: "March, will you let me stay in your room?"He even got her name wrong.A coming of age story about loss, the wonders of falling in love, and ultimately, pretending to be normal. Get inside April's distorted and yet humorous perspective, and watch as her tale unfolds into a shocking finish.
author: Cathy Octo
